name: Have an Ice Day!
description:
Only a cryokinetic like you can save this town!

DOUBLE-CLICK THE GREEN FLAG!

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

Left/Right Arrow Keys - move/aim
Z - jump
X - use magic
Up Arrow Key - talk/aim
Down Arrow Key - aim
Spacebar - specific menu prompts

GAMEPAD CONTROLS (Xbox)

Left/Right Analog/Dpad - move/aim
A - jump
X - use magic
Up Analog/Dpad - talk/aim
Down Analog/Dpad Arrow Key - aim
Start/menu - specific menu prompts (whenever it says to press space)

can't complete a mission? remember to talk to an NPC again if there's a check above their head to complete the mission. if you can't figure out how to do the objective, you might need another upgrade.
